title: See Who Favorited Your TikTok: App Guide to Seeing Who Saved Your TikToks

steps.title: Open TikTok.
steps.content: Open TikTok. Tap the icon that looks like a multicolored music note to launch the mobile app on your smartphone or tablet. It's also known as " saving a TikTok " when someone adds it to their favorites. In that case, they can easily find and re-watch videos they really like.

steps.title: Tap Inbox.
steps.content: Tap Inbox . It's an icon that looks like a speech bubble with a line in the middle that you'll find at the bottom of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Activities.
steps.content: Tap Activities . It's next to a pink icon with a bell on it. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the drop-down at the top of the screen and select Likes and Favorites.
steps.content: Tap the drop-down at the top of the screen and select Likes and Favorites . This will filter the list of activities to only likes and favorites. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Scroll through to see who favorited your videos.
steps.content: Scroll through to see who favorited your videos. You can see who added your video to their Favorites. Tap that activity to see more. You will see anonymous and specific results if you go to the video on your profile, tap â€¦ > Analytics , and tap the bookmark icon. In that case, you'll see the number of people who added that video to their favorites and their username if it's a public account. Find the videos you added to favorites by going to your profile and tapping the bookmark icon.
